sentences.en: E 2 and E 5 sets mainly produced stainable abortive pollens ( SAP ), whereas E 3 set mainly did empty abortive pollens ( EAP ).
sentences.cn: E2和E5位点组的作用主要产生染败花粉, 而E3位点组的作用主要产生空败花粉.

sentences.en: Even if the attempt was premature, but also better than abortive strategy.
sentences.cn: 即使是不成熟的尝试, 也胜于胎死腹中的策略.

sentences.en: EXMP: We had to abandon our abortive attempts.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不放弃我们失败的尝试.

sentences.en: He tried upon the lock, but each attempt proved abortive.
sentences.cn: 他企图把锁撬开, 但一次一次都失败了.

sentences.en: It would be an abortive effort to try to close this wide price gap.
sentences.cn: 设法缩小这样大的价格差距将是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Somehow the whole abortive affair got into the FBI files.
sentences.cn: 这件早已夭折的案子不知怎么就进了联邦调查局的档案.

sentences.en: The abortive seeds only accumulated abscises acid, which caused the abortion and inactivation.
sentences.cn: 败育的杉木涩籽中只积累较多的脱落酸, 说明了败育涩籽的衰败和失活.

sentences.en: The big , empty and abortive pollen grains are abserred at the stage of uninuclear microspore.
